channel.title: Comments on: Thunder Special

item.title: By: Ang Ruch
item.dc:creator: Ang Ruch
item.description: It's definitely my go to flavor. I'll switch it up and then remember about this flavor, get it again, and realize why I like it so much. It has a really good fruit flavor.
item.content:encoded: It’s definitely my go to flavor. I’ll switch it up and then remember about this flavor, get it again, and realize why I like it so much. It has a really good fruit flavor.

item.title: By: Greg
item.dc:creator: Greg
item.description: I'm almost lost for words for this. It's simply amazing. This may just go straight to the top of my favorite ADV list.
item.content:encoded: I’m almost lost for words for this. It’s simply amazing. This may just go straight to the top of my favorite ADV list.

item.title: By: Kelly Womack Randis
item.dc:creator: Kelly Womack Randis
item.description: Probably my favorite flavor to date. I will definitely be purchasing this one again.
item.content:encoded: Probably my favorite flavor to date. I will definitely be purchasing this one again.
